about.subtitle: About Us
about.title: Success Story in Construction & Industry
about.paragraph1: Ardmir Shpk originated as a family business founded in 1991 by Mr. Përparim Çobo. The company has evolved from agricultural machinery to become a multifaceted business specializing in construction, infrastructure works, mining, and industrial services.
about.paragraph2: Since its official establishment on January 4, 2008, we've completed important projects throughout Albania, including river protection works, infrastructure development, and mining operations with our Mining License No.1577 dated 07.09.2012 for limestone exploitation.

import.title: Import & Export / Trade
import.description: Import and export of goods, including transportation vehicles, excavators, and heavy machinery for construction purposes. We also offer retail trade of machinery components, spare parts, oils, and greases for industrial equipment.

construction.title: Construction & Infrastructure
construction.description: Implementation of various construction projects including earthworks, masonry, reinforced concrete, demolition, road construction, asphalt paving, gas pipelines, civil buildings, canalization works, and artistic structures. We've successfully completed numerous river protection works across Albania.

mining.title: Mining & Material Production
mining.description: Exploitation of limestone (planar and massive) with Mining License No.1577 dated 07.09.2012. We operate quarries and gravel pits, produce concrete through our concrete plant, and offer various inert materials for construction in retail and wholesale quantities.

machinery.title: Heavy Machinery & Industrial Services
machinery.description: We own and operate a comprehensive fleet including Liebherr, Caterpillar, and Volvo excavators, bulldozers, concrete mixers, dump trucks, and specialized equipment. Our services include installation and maintenance of energy production and distribution systems, including medium and high voltage lines.

additional.title: Additional Services
additional.description: We provide services in green area maintenance, maritime constructions, deep port works, wood and metal production. Our transport services include road transport of construction materials and various goods for third parties both domestically and internationally.

agriculture.title: Agricultural Products
agriculture.description: Collection point for trading, packaging and export of agricultural products (fruits and vegetables) for domestic and international markets, ensuring product quality and freshness throughout the supply chain.

2.name: Albanian Public Agency
2.text: The river protection works completed by Ardmir Shpk have met all technical specifications and quality standards. Their attention to detail and dedication to environmental protection during construction has been exemplary.

3.name: Municipality of Dimal
3.text: Our collaboration with Ardmir Shpk on protection works from the Osum river erosion in the Dafina area has been highly successful. Their technical expertise and quick response have helped prevent significant potential damage to our community.
